content:
Since exhaustive patterns and uninhabited types were brought up by @scottmcm... what is the status of !? AFAIK https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/67225 is the latest issue. What is blocking progress here?
I'd be delighted to finally see this type land, and wonder if there's any way I can help.^^
Last I remember there were type inference problems, but that could have been a different attempt at stabilization
yeah that's what the above issue is about
@RalfJ following up on this really old topic -- see #t-lang/project-never-type

https://hackmd.io/KiXlJ-m5Sz6Rs7F9JadNqg?edit is my latest draft -- just written up -- of a possible summary / next steps issue for never type; I expect to iterate a bit more and likely file that as a T-lang design meeting proposal so we can discuss it, though possibly not this next round. I'd like to find some time to implement the hybrid 2 proposed there and make sure it addresses the breakage as expected.
(I've linked to this in #t-lang/project-never-type : https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/259160-t-lang.2Fproject-never-type/topic/draft.20next.20steps)
thanks @Jeremiah Senkpiel! let's move the conversation there
